name: TRAFFIK
description:
TRAFFIK is an award-winning Orange County advertising and digital media agency located in Irvine, California. Founded in 2000, this full-service idea house is an active difference maker in several industries, including medical insurance and devices, consumer products and retail, as well as B2B and B2C marketing.
TRAFFIK is known primarily for its expertise in marketing for regulated industries, its emphasis on producing highly visible creative and advanced digital content, and for its philosophy of partnering with clients to develop highly specified, results-oriented strategies.
